posts.title: Welcome to my blog!
posts.author: Kris Airdancer
posts.body:
Welcome to my buggy blog! It really does have a lot of bugs, but I'll iron those out eventually.

My intent for this thing is to be able to blog from Europe while Vista and I hike Der Traumpfad. But I'm still a bit skeptical that this will work. Guess we'll just have to see how it goes.

Oh! I should also mention, don't expect any images. I wasn't interested in taking the time to put that part of this blog together. Sorry, not sorry.
